title: Go Gift yourself
body: Hey in the event it says you can gift yourself, anybody know how to do it and can explain to a plebe like me? Thanks in advance!

replies.body: You can currently gift yourself with a Mystery Gift or Mystery Chest.  You should see it in the Skins section of the store! :D
Actually figured it out, for anyone else who might have been confused if you go to the skin/champion tabs in the store mystery skin/champion should be the first choice.
Mystery champions and skins, previously only available to gift to other people, are able to be purchased for yourself in the store.
